name: iPhone 13
description: The iPhone 13 features a Super Retina XDR display, A15 Bionic chip, advanced dual-camera system, and longer battery life.

name: Samsung G S22
description: The Samsung Galaxy S22 features a 6.1-inch Dynamic AMOLED display, Exynos 2200 processor, and a versatile triple-camera system.

name: Google Pixel 6
description: The Google Pixel 6 features a 6.4-inch Full HD+ OLED display, Google Tensor chip, and a dual-camera system with advanced AI.

name: OnePlus 10 Pro

name: Xiaomi 12
